description:
Educare Skill offers endless captivating educational content tailored for our children and adults alike. With a constant influx of fresh material, there's always something new to discover and learn, ensuring endless opportunities for both education and entertainment.

Current Content Highlights:

Embark on a learning journey with Educare Skill's vast reservoir of educational and entertaining content, meticulously curated for young learners. Delight in read-aloud videos, captivating animated series, enchanting nursery rhymes, and interactive gamified learning experiences.

Dive into three captivating animated series: "Dr. Carrot," "Tales of Four Friends," and "Adventures of the Monkey King," each comprising 12 episodes brimming with entertainment and valuable life lessons. Additionally, enjoy 24 episodes of animated nursery rhymes starring Nono and Daza, as they embark on delightful adventures.

Explore over 180 colorful READ-ALOUD stories in both Dzongkha and English, including classics like "Monkey King" and "Dragon Tales." Engage in interactive gamified learning with CHEYCHEY, designed to introduce foundational concepts such as alphabets, colors, and shapes, in an entertaining and immersive manner.

Foster a Reading Culture:

Experience the joy of storytelling through read-aloud video series, enriching vocabulary, and enhancing proficiency in Dzongkha and English. These engaging and vibrant stories impart timeless values and lessons, fostering a love for learning on the go.

Play, Learn, and Discover:

With our interactive gamified learning, CHEYCHEY, provides opportunities for children to explore foundational concepts such as alphabets, colors, shapes, and more. Soon, through these interactive games, children will get to learn and explore foundational Dzongkha, English, maths, and science concepts.

Future Endeavors:

Educare Skill is committed to expanding its repository with tutorials and learning materials to support academic studies and exam preparations. 
Additionally, anticipate professional, vocational, and skill-oriented courses, catering to individuals seeking to enhance their knowledge and expertise. Our platform aims to serve children, students, professionals, and even farmers alike.

Meet the Minds Behind Educare Skill:

The entire content, as well as the technology, has been developed by Bhutanese. The platform is an initiative of iBEST company. More than 100 Bhutanese professionals have worked on various aspects of the project for over a year. Educare Skill has been designed and developed using the latest technology. The platform is user-friendly and available on iOS.

Our objective with the platform is to provide quality content to our children and anyone else interested in learning. It is intended as a supplement to school learning, in a fun and engaging way. We believe that such a platform will help make learning easier and more attractive for children.

The Druk Zakar App offers a 12-month, day-to-day astrological calendar based on the Bhutanese lunar year. It draws from the Datho (Book of Astrology), published by the Dratshang Lhentshog, Bhutan’s Council for Religious Affairs. Druk Zakar provides daily guidance on auspicious and inauspicious activities, helping users know which actions — such as hoisting a flag or starting important work — are favorable or best avoided on any given day.

This app contains a collection of more than 100+ daily Buddhist Prayers. It would help users to pray anywhere anytime.

Features in this app are:
- English Translations
- English Phonetics
- Prayer Audio
- Counter and Save
- Pronunciation Guide
- Notification or Reminder on Holy Days
-Zakar (Temporarily Not Available)
-Bhutanese Calendar
- For more, please kindly download and check yourself.....

* a selection of the best free translators, dictionaries and language courses on the phone. easy to use.
* speak and translate is an indispensable voice and text translator that allows to communicate effectively in any corner of the globe.
* English To Dzongkha Translator And Dzongkha To English Translation is a must have app for any traveler around the world. you will have access to the best languages packs and voice recognition in the world within your device that you can carry anywhere you go. this language app is designed for many purposes in mind including: everyday conversation, traffic signs, maps, local news, business languages, academic papers, and so on. with just a few taps on your device you will be able to understand most written and spoken words in the language you are not familiar with. it will greatly assist you in communicating with the locals.

key features:
---------------------------------------

- translate individual words, phrases, or whole sentences

Stop being addlepated with unknown words! Don’t know what ‘addlepated’ means?

Get a step ahead. While others are looking up definitions, you already know the answer. 
 
Embark on an exciting journey into the lexical world with Word of the Day. 
 
To get started, take a quick vocab test to see how many words you already know. Now you are all set to begin learning new academic, obscure, and challenging vocabulary today, and every day.
 
Whether you are a native English speaker preparing for the SAT or GRE test, an ESL learner studying for IELTS or TOEFL or someone who loves to geek out on words, Word of the Day has got you covered. 
 
Designed by a team of corpus linguists, the app’s state-of-the-art word recommendation system will suggest words tailored to your vocabulary level, interests and learning needs. 
 
The Word of the Day dictionary content (pronunciation, definitions and example sentences) is powered by Oxford Languages.
 
An in-house editorial team is here to delight you with cool new word features every single day. That’s 365 beautifully narrated and illustrated word stories a year. 

Too busy? Pick the best time to receive daily word notifications. Set up the Word of the Day widget to learn and revise recently discovered words. 
 
Love the word? Store it in your own word collection.
 
Turn word learning into a powerful self-improvement habit with Word of the Day. 
 
Become first to start a conversation. Express yourself clearly. Wow your friends, family, teachers and colleagues. Ace your tests. Improve your writing and public speaking skills. Read any scientific article in one breath. Flex your brain and keep your mind focused. Express your thoughts clearly. Sound sexier.
 
Educate yourself in a small, yet profound way with Word of the Day. 

Please note that Word of the Day is a subscription-based app. Some of the app’s features are available to Premium subscribers only.

Privacy Policy: https://console.wordwordapp.com/docs/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://console.wordwordapp.com/docs/terms.html

developer: G2C Office, Royal Government of Bhutan
description:
Bilingual Dzongkha (Bhutanese) English dictionary and also includes the English-Dzongkha terminology related to Computer, Economics, Financial, Health and Political terms.

The app consists of major monolingual (Dzongkha) and bilingual(Dzongkha-English and English-Dzongkha) dictionaries of the Dzongkha Development Commission.

BetterSpeak: Your AI Tutor for Language Speaking
Do you want to speak English more fluently, confidently, and naturally? BetterSpeak is your personal AI English tutor designed to help you practice speaking through lifelike conversations, real-time corrections, and personalized feedback. 

Whether you’re preparing for exams, traveling abroad, attending meetings, or simply aiming to sound more natural, BetterSpeak turns your smartphone into your personal speaking coach.

- Smarter Than a Textbook – Your AI Language Tutor
Unlike traditional apps that only teach vocabulary and grammar, BetterSpeak puts speaking first. You’ll talk with an AI tutor that understands your strengths, identifies your weak points, and adapts lessons to your learning style and goals.

- Practice English with a Lifelike Avatar Tutor
Have face-to-face speaking practice with a friendly, expressive AI tutor. This animated coach helps you stay motivated while correcting your pronunciation, grammar, and sentence structure in real time—just like a real tutor would.

- Real-Life Speaking Practice Without the Fear
Feel shy or unsure about your English? BetterSpeak creates a safe and supportive space to practice real-life conversations—from job interviews to airport dialogues or casual small talk—without fear of judgment.

- Progress You Can See and Feel
Track your growth over time with detailed reports on pronunciation clarity, fluency, grammar accuracy, and vocabulary usage. Watch your confidence grow as your English improves session by session.

- A Personalized Program That Fits You
No more generic lessons. BetterSpeak builds a custom speaking journey tailored to your level and needs—whether you're a beginner or intermediate learner. Focus on the skills that matter most to you.

- Multilingual Support for Beginners
Just starting out? You can learn and practice English even if your native language is Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish, Italian, German, or French. Your AI tutor supports you in your own language while guiding you toward fluent English.

- Real-Time Corrections & Instant Feedback
BetterSpeak doesn’t just listen—it responds. You’ll receive instant, constructive feedback on your grammar, vocabulary usage, pronunciation, and fluency, helping you adjust and improve on the spot.

- Motivating & Gamified Learning
Set daily speaking goals, earn badges, collect points, and build streaks that keep you engaged. BetterSpeak turns language learning into a habit—and a fun one.

- Built for Real People with Real Goals
From passing the IELTS or TOEFL to improving business communication or daily conversation skills, BetterSpeak is your intelligent, always-available tutor for practical speaking success.

- Download BetterSpeak Today
Join thousands of learners who are unlocking their English speaking potential with BetterSpeak. Say goodbye to hesitation, and hello to confident, clear communication.



We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or feedback to make BetterSpeak better, we'd love to hear from you. Don't hesitate to contact us at support@betterspeak.com

Privacy Policy: https://betterspeak.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://betterspeak.com/terms

ABC Run Game: Learn, Match, and Discover
Step into the world of Endless Alphabet ABC Game, now reimagined with brand-new educational mini games! This ultimate Learn ABC Educational Game keeps the fun going—without the running—by blending interactive play with ABCD Alphabet Letter Learning in fresh and exciting ways.
What’s New in ABC Run Game?

Smart Mini Games
Explore a collection of learning mini games designed to boost early skills. Match shadows, pair items, and solve fun puzzles that reinforce letter recognition, logic, and observation.

Vehicle Adventures
Drive colorful vehicles to pick up letters, animals, and birds. Collect ABC letters while discovering the sounds, names, and fun facts about what you pick up—turning playtime into an exciting learning mission.

Alphabet Exploration
Continue the Alphabet Adventure by collecting letters from A to Z in creative new ways—matching, driving, and tapping your way to learning success.

Vibrant and Engaging World
Bright visuals, cheerful music, and interactive scenes make each moment feel magical—perfect for sparking curiosity in young learners.

developer: Shenzhen Apeuni Educational Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
APEUni PTE is a practice and study APP for PTE exam.

1. Practice Questions
Freely practice with thousands of questions.

2. APEUni AI Scoring Engine
APEUni APP simulates the real PTE scoring system. It can accurately judge pronunciation, fluency of all speaking question types, and give alerts on grammar and spelling errors for writing items.

3. APEUni Community
Join the worldwide PTE community to learn and share PTE study experience and tips.

4. PTE Study Guide
PTE study guides are available for PTE test takers to quickly grasp PTE exam techniques of all question types. Prepare and practice with clear guidance and confidence.

Our value: PTE preparation and learning should be easy. We are determined to help every PTE test taker to shorten the PTE study duration and achieve success.

If you have any questions, please contact us by：
Email: support@apeuni.com
Telegram Group: https://t.me/pteapeuni

Kunchhab Pal—licensed in 2025 under the Laws of the Kingdom of Bhutan—is an
emerging Bhutanese digital platform created by a team of young Bhutanese to make
learning fun, engaging, and rewarding. Our mobile app connects the Bhutanese community
through LIVE Quiz Challenges held once or twice a week, where participants register, join,
and compete in real time to win attractive prizes, including exciting cash rewards.
What makes Kunchhab Pal unique is its Online LIVE Challenge, where everyone competes
simultaneously—making it a true test of knowledge, not luck. Covering topics from
education, current affairs, and general knowledge to music, culture, and
entertainment, the platform offers a balanced and inclusive experience for all age groups.
Kunchhab Pal aspires to share invaluable knowledge about Bhutan’s rich heritage while
promoting interactive learning and healthy competition. More than just a quiz app, it’s a
community-driven space where Bhutanese of all generations can come together to learn,
connect, and celebrate knowledge.
We’re constantly evolving, with many new features and surprises on the way. Stay tuned
and follow our socials for updates as we continue to make learning truly rewarding for
everyone!

Ready to Speak English Confidently? 

Welcome to Learna AI English Tutor App, your all-in-one solution for mastering the English language! Learn English with grammar, speaking, reading, pronunciation, and vocabulary practices designed to enhance your proficiency in every aspect of the language.

With Learna AI, you can speak English confidently and effectively through interactive conversations. Our app takes your language learning journey beyond traditional methods. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Learna AI is here to help you learn & speak English in a fun, engaging, and personalized way.

English practices and lessons are guided by our Learna AI Virtual Chat Character, offering tailored support as you learn. You can speak with the AI character to improve both your speaking and listening skills. The app provides real-time feedback, helping you speak correctly and refine your vocabulary as you go. This makes learning English more dynamic, interactive, and efficient, as you can practice speaking at your own pace.

Learna AI also focuses on improving your grammar skills. You’ll learn essential grammar rules and practice them through a variety of exercises that help reinforce your understanding. The grammar practices are designed to gradually improve your proficiency, allowing you to speak with accuracy and clarity. As you learn grammar, you will build a stronger foundation for your speaking and writing skills.

Vocabulary plays a critical role in speaking English fluently. With Learna AI, you can improve your vocabulary by learning new words and phrases that are practical and useful in daily conversations. Each lesson focuses on building your vocabulary, ensuring you have a broad range of words at your disposal. The app features vocabulary practice that adapts to your level, helping you speak more naturally and confidently.

Your pronunciation also gets a boost with Learna AI. As you speak, you’ll receive valuable feedback to improve your pronunciation. The app includes exercises specifically designed to help you master English pronunciation and speak clearly. Pronunciation practices allow you to correct mistakes and sound more authentic when speaking English.

Track your progress with detailed performance metrics and milestones. Set learning goals to monitor your achievements and celebrate your successes. With continuous practice, you’ll see your speaking skills improve, and your vocabulary will expand. By setting specific goals, you ensure that each practice session is focused and effective.

Learna AI Language Tutor Features:

English Conversation Practice with Learna AI Virtual Chat Character
Get feedback from Learna AI for your mistakes
Learn English Grammar with tailored lessons
Improve your English Reading Skills
Enrich your English Vocabulary with daily vocabulary practices & Learn new words 
Spelling Check and vocabulary reinforcement
Perfect your English Pronunciation through interactive exercises
Enhance your English Speaking Skills through practical speaking practice
Track your progress and set goals to continually improve
Speak, practice, and learn today with Learna AI, your partner in mastering the English language!

Welcome to Alphabet Adventure, the fun, interactive way for kids to explore letters, sounds, and words! Perfect for toddlers, preschoolers, and early learners, this app turns learning into play with engaging alphabet games, lively animations, and adorable characters. Designed to build abc skills, phonics awareness, and early spelling confidence, it’s the ultimate learning game for kids.

Learn ABCs & Phonics
Kids discover each letter of the alphabet through interactive puzzles, tracing activities, and funny animations. Drag letters into place to spell words, hear their sounds, and watch the meaning come alive with cute, animated scenes. Our abc games reinforce letter sounds, helping kids connect letters to words.

Tracing Letters & Numbers
Practice writing with letter tracing and tracing letters and numbers activities! Children trace uppercase and lowercase letters step-by-step, improving fine motor skills and handwriting confidence. Tracing lines are guided with voice prompts and visual cues, making learning intuitive.

Vocabulary & Word Building
Expand your child’s vocabulary through playful word puzzles. Each new word introduces a fun definition with a short animation. These spelling games for kids turn every new word into an adventure!

Creative Play & Extras
Our educational experience includes playful monsters, silly sounds, and colorful visuals to keep every child engaged.

Why Parents Love It

Self-paced learning: no scores, no stress

Fun early literacy tool recommended by educators

Works offline: perfect for travel or waiting rooms

Regular updates with new words and activities

Backed by research, this app blends phonics-based learning games, alphabet flash cards, and interactive storytelling into one engaging package. Kids aged 2–6 enjoy exploring letters while unknowingly building reading readiness, vocabulary, and confidence.

Use it as a companion to other early learning tools like abc mouse, super simple songs, and preschool learning games free. Great for homeschooling, classroom centers, or casual playtime.

Whether your child is tracing their first letter, building words, or discovering sounds, Alphabet Adventure makes it fun and joyful. Perfect for ages 2+, it’s a wonderful way to introduce ABCs while boosting vocabulary and language skills.

Download this Alphabet Adventure today and give your child the gift of playful learning through free toddler learning games that grow with them!

** App Store's Editor's Choice ** 


*From the team at ORIGINATOR - the creators of the beloved Endless Alphabet and Sesame Street's Monster at the End of This Book and Another Monster....  Originator is a team of passionate artists and engineers dedicated to the best education+entertainment apps for kids.*

As a follow-up to Endless Alphabet, set the stage for early reading success with Endless Reader!  This app introduces "sight words", the most commonly used words in school, library, and children's books.  Kids need to recognize these words by sight in order to achieve reading fluency.  Recognizing sight words is advantageous for beginning readers because many of these words have unusual spelling, cannot be sounded out using phonics knowledge, and often cannot be represented using pictures. 

Kids will have a blast learning sight words and their context and usage with the adorable Endless monsters.  Each word features an interactive word puzzle with letters that come alive, and then a sentence puzzle with words that become what they describe.  See the word "dog" as a barking dog, and the word "up" reach for the sky!

** NOTE: You must be online and have sufficient disk space while running the app to get all words in the app. **

Features:
- 6 words free to try with additional word packs available for purchase.
- Delightful animations reinforce sight recognition of words in a fun and interactive way.
- Word puzzles reinforce spelling using lower-case letters and the sentence puzzles teach definition and usage (in addition to sight recognition).
- 3D Touch on iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus makes letters and words react in an extra special way!
- Endless Reader was designed with your children in mind.  There are no high scores, failures, limits or stress.  Your children can interact with the app at their own pace.

Talkpal AI is a GPT-powered language learning app that helps millions of learners speak, listen, read and write more confidently in a new language.
Practise realistic conversations with advanced AI voice and chat, and learn 57+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, and more.

WHY CHOOSE TALKPAL?

TRUSTED BY MILLIONS OF USERS WORLDWIDE

WHAT YOU GET WITH TALKPAL
Start speaking from day one with bite-sized lessons. Practise with immersive AI language learning modes designed to build real fluency and improve your speaking skills:
1. Chat Mode: speak with a GPT-powered personalised AI language tutor

SKILLS YOU WILL IMPROVE

FOCUS ON YOUR GOALS

FEEDBACK AND PROGRESS TRACKING

- Improve speaking, listening, writing and reading skills

WHY TALKPAL

On the auspicious occasion of Zhabdrung Kuchoe (May 2022), (Khamsum Zilnon Drupai Lhakhang) KZDL is pleased to announce the release of KZDL Prayer App version 1.0. This splashy, easy-to-use, and readily accessible prayer book app has been sponsored by private individuals from the Bhutanese community in Perth and developed under the close guidance of Khenpo Tshering Wangchuk, the Chair of KZDL, for the benefit of our global Buddhist community. Translation, transliteration and voice narration are due to be updated in the next version of this app, therefore, user opinions and feedback would be much appreciated.

Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian. developer: HELLOTALK FOREIGN LANGUAGE EXCHANGE LEARNING TALK CHAT APP
description:
Practice languages with native speakers on HelloTalk! We recently introduced HelloTalk Live and Voiceroom - interactive language and culture events to help you master languages through the content you love! 

HelloTalk, the original language exchange app, connects you with native speakers to practice languages (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, Mandarin Chinese, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian, Arabic, Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, Thai, Vietnamese and 160+ more) for FREE! 

HelloTalk equips you with learning tools such as translation and instant captions so you can learn by chatting with native speakers. Learn languages from locals around the world through livestreams and Voicerooms. Connect with expert hosts to discuss interesting topics with language partners in the learning community! 

Why HelloTalk? 

► Real language learning atmosphere 
Whether you're focused on a widely spoken language or a less common one, HelloTalk caters to your needs. The system smartly matches you based on your native language and proficiency, while allowing you to filter ideal language partners according to various criteria such as age, location, and gender. Plus, with built-in translation and transliteration tools, you can communicate confidently without any language barriers.

► A powerful tool for sharpening your language skills
Acquiring new words through conversations with native speakers is more effective than rigid memorization. Whether you're a student preparing for exams like the CET, GRE, TOEFL, IELTS, planning to study abroad, or a professional seeking career advancement through language skills, HelloTalk offers native speakers who match your proficiency level for engaging interactions and valuable learning experiences.

► Immersive multi-person language chat rooms
If you choose to learn Spanish, for example, every Voiceroom you enter on HelloTalk gathers Spanish learners and Spanish native speakers from around the world to discuss interesting topics. Here, only your voice needs to be heard, creating a comfortable, introvert-friendly atmosphere. Here, sharing mutual interests allows everyone to freely express themselves and share personal experiences, fostering both language intuition and authentic expression skills. It's incredibly addictive!

► Diverse global Livestreams
HelloTalk features handpicked foreign language hosts who offer online video lessons, share language insights, and provide glimpses into their lives abroad. You can even join them on stage for one-on-one video conversations with fellow language learners. Whether you're grappling with pronunciation, speaking speed, or shyness, these hosts will assist you in refining your language skills and guiding the conversation. For rapid improvement in spoken language, there's no substitute for direct communication with native speakers!

► International Moments
HelloTalk's Moments offers real-time posts covering learning, lifestyle, and cultural insights from around the world. It's your ticket to discovering fresh perspectives and gaining deeper insights into diverse cultural customs, all from the comfort of your home. Don't forget to engage with posts that catch your interest!

What the world is saying about HelloTalk
“One of the best apps to help you learn a new language.” - 9to5Mac 
"When you're ready to experiment with a foreign language, HelloTalk provides an excellent opportunity for interaction with other speakers." –PCMag 
"HelloTalk, which connects native speakers with an apprentice, also offers language exchanges to its 20 million users in more than 150 languages." -Forbes 

START PRACTICING LANGUAGES RIGHT AWAY!!!

Learn more about the HelloTalk app: 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Hellotalk/ 
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/hellotalkapp 

Send any feedback to support@hellotalk.com 
- Privacy Policy: https://www.hellotalk.com/privacy-policy 
- Terms of Use: https://www.hellotalk.com/terms-of-service

Whether you're traveling, learning Dzongkha, or need quick translations for work or study, the English Dzongkha Translator app is your perfect language companion. This easy-to-use app helps you translate words, sentences, and phrases between English and Dzongkha in just a few taps.

Simple & Intuitive Interface: Easy to use with a clean, user-friendly design.

Favourite & History: Save your favourite translations and view your history for quick access.

Why Choose English Dzongkha Translator?

Perfect for traveler's, students, and language learners.

Helps you communicate effectively in both languages.

Reliable and efficient, with fast translation speed.

Classroom is a free service for schools, non-profits and anyone with a personal Google Account. Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connect – inside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate and stay organised.

Classroom is designed to help teachers create, collect and mark assignments paperlessly, including time-saving features like the ability to automatically make a copy of a Google Document for each student. It also creates Drive folders for each assignment and for each student to help keep everyone organised.

Students can keep track of what's due on the Assignments page and begin working with just a click. Teachers can quickly see who has or hasn't completed the work, and provide direct, real-time feedback and marks from within Classroom.

With the mobile app for iOS, students and teachers can view their classes and communicate with their classmates in real time. Students can open their assignments and work on them right from their iPhone or iPad. Teachers can keep track of who has handed in work and mark the assignment – at school or on the go. Students and teachers receive notifications when they have new content in Classroom, so they are always up to date.

There are many benefits of using Classroom:

Easy to set up
Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.

Saves time
The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.

Improves organisation
Students can see all of their assignments on an Assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.

Enhances communication
Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.

Secure
Like the rest of Google Workspace for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, and never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes.

Permissions notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Microphone: Needed to enable audio capture for recording videos to be posted to Classroom.
Photos: Needed to allow the user to attach photos or videos to Classroom. Photos or videos posted to Classroom will be stored on Google servers in order to show them in Classroom.

Presenting Dzongkha NLP: a revolutionary app for Dzongkha Natural Language Processing, Bhutan's National Language. Developed collaboratively by the College of Science & Technology and the Department of Culture & Dzongkha Development, it offers:
1. Dzongkha-English and English-Dzongkha Translation
2. Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR)/ Speech-to-Text Conversion for Dzongkha
3. Text-to-Speech (TTS) Conversion for Dzongkha

Unlock the power of language with Dzongkha NLP—a fusion of tradition and innovation, transforming communication and accessibility.

Studley AI – The AI Study Tool That Gets You Straight A’s

Forget boring flashcards and endless Google searches. Studley AI is your personal AI homework helper, AI note taker, and AI tutor. Built for students who want insane results. Whether you’re trying to keep a 4.0 GPA or just trying to pass with less stress, Studley is the smartest way to study.

Turn anything into a Study Set:
Upload your lecture slides, textbook chapter, YouTube video, PDF, or even an article link, and Studley instantly turns it into a fully editable Study Set. 

A Study Set can include:

- Flashcards (perfect for memorization)
- Multiple-choice quizzes (test your recall fast)
- Fill-in-the-blanks (strengthen active recall)
- Written tests (practice full answers)
- Tutor mode (AI explains concepts like a personal teacher)

Every question is automatically tagged (e.g., unfamiliar, learning, familiar, mastered) so you can track progress in real time. You’ll literally see your weak spots disappear as you move questions into higher mastery levels.

Progress tracking that actually works:


Our system uses Active Recall and spaced repetition to make sure you remember what you learn long term. No more rereading notes 10 times. Studley forces your brain to work with memory science, not against it. You’ll walk into every exam feeling like you’ve already taken it.

The Solve Tab – Instant Answers, Step-by-Step:


Got a tough homework problem or confusing question? Just take a pic in the Solve tab, and Studley’s AI gives you step-by-step explanations. Not just the answer. This is your 24/7 tutor that never judges you for asking “dumb” questions.

Why Studley AI beats Quizlet (and everything else):

- Smarter AI – You’re not stuck with generic flashcards; every question is made from your content.
- Tagging system – Quizlet can’t show you exactly which questions you’ve mastered vs. which still trip you up. Studley can.
- Fully editable – Change, add, or delete anything. Make it 100% your style.
- All-in-one – No switching between apps for notes, practice tests, and tutors. It’s all here.
- Built for the students who actually want to win.

Studley is powered by proven study methods like:

- Active Recall – Forces you to retrieve info from memory, which strengthens retention.
- Spaced Repetition – Keeps reviewing just before you forget, so it sticks forever.
- Bloom’s Taxonomy – Helps you move beyond memorization into deeper understanding.
- Feynman Technique – Makes sure you can explain concepts clearly, not just repeat them.

How students are using Studley to get a 4.0 GPA:

- Prepping for finals in half the time by turning whole courses into Study Sets.
- Using the tagging system to focus only on “unfamiliar” questions until they’re mastered.
- Swapping Quizlet for Studley to have AI generate better practice questions from any content.
- Getting AI tutoring on hard topics without paying $50/hour.

Why you’ll never go back to old-school studying:

- Fast – Turn any material into a Study Set in seconds.
- Personalized – Tags + progress tracking keep you working only on what matters.
- Affordable – All the features of a private tutor, without the price.
- Proven – Based on real memory science, not gimmicks.

Free to try. Access is limited on the free plan. Upgrade to get unlimited Study Sets and Solve Tab usage.
